name: Occult
description: A very work-in-progress start to a more Lovecraftian-focussed version of Cataclysm set in the 1920s, with 99.9% of the population mysteriously dissapearing at midnight of day 0.  Players will take on the roles of investigators in a variety of professions battling the denizens of the shadows to recover and rebuild society - with no zombies in sight!
